mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III to Jane C. Washington, 1839 September 17
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: John Augustine Washington writes to 'My dear Mother' reporting that he has secured living arrangements with Mr. Meriwether in Charlottesville. Wants to purchase a mare for transportation to school as Mr. Meriwether resides 3 miles away from school. Needs her permission to take only 2 courses at university. Was delayed in arriving at the start of semester due to visit with Aunt Judy. Letter sent to Mount Vernon and later forwarded to Charlestown, Jefferson County, VA (now WV). Autograph letter signed, 3 pages, integral address panel.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Elswyth Thane Beebe Collection of Washington Family Papers
